resources.string: URL is not responding in the expected way

Warning: medic-gateway is not set as the default messaging app on this device.
 
 
The app may not perform as expected unless it is set as the default messaging app:
 

the SMS inbox may fill up and prevent new messages arriving 

 
On the other hand, if you set medic-gateway as the default messaging app, you may find:
 

composing SMS is no longer possible 

sending and receiving MMS (picture messages) no longer works
Retry forwarding message from %s to webapp?
Retry forwarding message from webapp to %s?
